website_summaries.verdict: The Sennheiser Urbanite XL is a well-designed Beats competitor that costs less and sounds as good or better.
pros: The Sennheiser Urbanite XL is a well-designed, comfortable to wear over-ear headphone that offers exciting, dynamic sound with quality bass
There's an integrated remote/microphone for calls (both an Android and iOS version of the headphone is available)

customer_reviews.title: Great Build and Sound Quality, But lacks comfort for people with bigger ears
customer_reviews.text: Pros- 1. clear, warm sound 2.portable and can be folded up 3.good build quality 4.detachable cable 5.aluminum hinges 6.earcup cables are neat and retract into the earcup 7.comfortable when hanged around my neck 8. Very visually appealing Cons- travel sack is cheap 1.Clamp pressure is not tight enough 2.Headphones will fall off if you tilt your head the wrong way 3.comfort is not good for people with bigger ears. Ears will touch the driver and cause irritation.Ear cups are also small. 4.short cable is only long enough for tablet and smartphone use 5. Earcup height adjustments do not stay in desired position 6. Headband doesn't distribute pressure well TL;DR: Good looking and Good sound; BUT not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: Oh Sennheiser, how I love thee.
customer_reviews.text: I was first introduced to Sennheiser while in Germany in the spring. I had heard they were amazing, but never really experienced a pair. Oh mama. I fell in love with the balance of these headphones. It's not the medioce sound from a pair of Bose, or the heavy beat sound of Beats. It feel so well tuned for everything across the spectrum. I have heard parts of songs that I have never heard before. Breathing from instrumentalists. Depth I didn't know existed in tracks I have been listening to for years. Once you realize what you are missing, it's hard to go back.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: These XL Sennheiser Have an Awesome sound quality. A Great sound stage that you would expect from Sennheiser. The fit over the ear is very comfortable for long periods of listening. I bought a little headphone amp to get a richer sound when listening with my Android phone, but even without the amp they sound good.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not great. A little loose fit. Does not block ambient sound.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty fuzzy low end, and very loose fit. So loose I lose some bass, and am able to hear ambient noise. Unfortunately the tightening screw for the cup sliders is behind the earcup, making it inaccessible... Overall a good sound, lots of bass, but not terribly revealing (such as the Grado 60s). I suggest trying these on in person before buying online. UPDATE. On my second pair after the headband snapped on the first set. Luckily the exchange was super easy.
customer_reviews.author: GD-CO

customer_reviews.title: The sound is good
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good, the comfort is good the fit is good. The Cushions suck because they constantly fall off / get dislodged and I have to put them back on constantly. Atleast once a day I have to put one of the cushions back on, they just slip off way too easy..... Its gotten to the point of frustration with them.
customer_reviews.author: NwolfZ

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had Sennheisers before. Once you get up to about the 250-300 dollar range, there headphones peak at perfect sound. I've tried the ones that are 600-800 dollars, but the 300 dollar pair give just as great sound as the 800 dollar ones. These here are very good for the price range. They don't have the sound boost that the more expensive ones give you. But the mids and bass are perfect. By sound boost, I mean the level of the volume. I wish they were louder. But they're good for this price. Very comfortable to wear. More so than I was expecting. You can wear these for hours without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Chase

customer_reviews.title: Solid Quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality, very comfortable to wear for hours, and well constructed product. I use this product almost everyday, and when I travel, and had no issues at all. The only negative thing I can say is I wish it came with a hard case, but I was able to purchase one (different brand) through Amazon. My wife loves to use these on her conference calls because they block out any background noise so she can focus without kids yelling/playing in the house. I would say if you're looking for a smooth looking, great sounding, reasonably priced headphones, these would be the one to buy. I've tried bose and beats and these are light years ahead all around!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I know there are a older set couldn't pass up the price. I had to replace my Monster Ntunes which I had for a few years. Broke the band. I remembered watching reviews on these in the past and found them to be the same price I paid for my Ntunes in the past. I love them sound great and built very well..
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Williams

customer_reviews.title: These are great for when I'm in the office and I don't ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great for when I'm in the office and I don't want my co-workers to talk to me. I absolutely love how this works well with my iPhone and makes talking on the phone very convenient when I have it plugged in. The sound is great and the ear pieces are super comfortable and soft. My only complaint is that the carrier it comes in is just a drawstring bag, I would much rather have preferred a hard case if I am packing for a trip to prevent any damage.
customer_reviews.author: btru

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones except they broke down after 10 months
customer_reviews.text: I would buy these headphones again with the protection plan. Pretty comfortable, sound is pretty nice, and even though I gave a 1 star for durability they ARE pretty durable compared to chinese copycats. But I expect my headphones to last at least 3 years, and they did not do that. Worse yet I paid $95 for them and now they're $70. I would say they're absolutely worth the $70 + protection plan.
customer_reviews.author: JohneRandom

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are a quality set of cans. I've been a fan of Sennheiser for a long time. The sound quality and frequency range is top notch. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: blackjack

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Sennheiser Urbanite headphones yesterday. Appearance, fit, etc. were all fine but there was no sound in the left ear. Despite working with the plugs on both ends, I could not produce sound in the left ear. I'm very disappointed to have to return them to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design, Decent sound at a Nice price point
customer_reviews.text: My first sets seemed to have a cable/connection issue so I needed a replacement. The second set sounds nice - coming from a more treble-focused pair of headphones, the sound sounds drastically different. It definitely seems to emphasize the bassier instruments in the mix, but the overall sound sounds like it lacks a bit of clarity. My ears still need to get used to this new balance. I still think it's a fun set of headphones for this price: the sound is decent at worst, and the design is stellar. Overall, it's a solid choice of headphones for the average consumer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They sound great but, I didn't realize the plug into the ...
customer_reviews.text: They sound great but, I didn't realize the plug into the headphones was 1.5mm - not the standard size and it has a proprietary lock built into the headphone plug. I found an extension to use with my computer gaming but, the cable that comes with it is very high quality and works great with my iPhone and MacBook Pro (remote control wise). would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Joe

customer_reviews.title: Forget what you heard.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I also had a problem with the left ear not working. (No Sound) However- if you just gentle take out the cord from the headset & make sure it goes all the way in (Firmly) before you twist to lock. No problem on the left ear..... Excellent sound, & I listen to "The Cello song" by The Piano guys. All the best !!!
customer_reviews.author: Mi07i

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work For Our Needs.
customer_reviews.text: I have the Sennheiser Urbanites On Ear and I love them so I recommended these for my hubby to use on his job. Unfortunately, they were not going to work for his needs because the cord was too short and he did not like the sound through the mic. I was thinking about keeping them for myself as a spare pair but the cup did not fit around my ear and hurt. So we sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda F. DoveTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Bought two of these products. Neither worked!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and currently working on the refund for it. I got another thinking it would be a fluke and had the same exact problem with it! (Cord is trash and did not work. One cup was only coming through and audio quality was TERRIBLE). Let these products rot in their warehouse. These are garbage and definitely were discontinued for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: Westley Morelock

customer_reviews.title: Sound great, but not over ear
customer_reviews.text: Sound great, but not over ear. My left ear would just start to hurt etc. I could not work around it. So after 2 weeks, I returned these. Very good sound, but not ergonomic for me. Rather let down on these.
customer_reviews.author: NovaLamp

customer_reviews.title: Great quality beautiful sennheiser sound but
customer_reviews.text: Great quality beautiful sennheiser sound but... Where is my bass? Do i need a portable amp to run them properly or do these need to break-in like my hesh 2's? According to sennheiser's website they don't, i guess i will see as time goes on
customer_reviews.author: Darius W

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound quality, amazing comfort.
customer_reviews.text: These were really comfortable and I loved the general design and how sturdy they felt, but the sound quality. Oh boy, the sound quality was horrendous. It was incredibly tinny sounding and some instruments could hardly be heard when I listened to the most bassy sounding music in my music list, and I require a good bass on my headphones personally. Because I listen to a lot of rock. It also had horrible volume, did not get loud enough, and I have sensitive hearing.
customer_reviews.author: Latashia

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of headphones!
customer_reviews.text: This pair of headphones is comfortable, has excellent sounding bass and good isolation. Sounds are very clear and even the cable is high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Sono

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: The sound, to include bass, is amazingly clear. Unlike other headphones with static filled loose bass these have a nice tight and clean thump. They even perform well across several genres. My only problem is the size, it would be nice if they weren't as bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Window shopper 3000

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are probably some of the best built and best sounding OEMs I've owned
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are probably some of the best built and best sounding OEMs I've owned. Although some would argue that these are geared toward bass heavy listeners to rival Beats, if your music source has the ability to reconfigure the EQ, they make for a well balanced listening experience. I use them with my Cowon Plenue D portable DAP using ALAC music files and after tinkering with the EQ settings, they sound amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Albert Garcia

customer_reviews.title: The sound is amazing, but the earphone cups keep falling apart
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing, but the earphone cups keep falling apart. They are secured using a rubber membrane, but unfortunately each ear piece falls out periodically. I just put it back on, but it stretches it each time. Eventually it's going to break permanently. I guess they must have done this on purpose so I have to buy a new pair when it stops working. Still I'm giving it 4 stars because the sound quality of every Sennheiser product I have used has been amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Vilma Gunn

customer_reviews.title: You get your monies worth here
customer_reviews.text: These are well designed and robust headphones. I like the fact that the cord can be disconnected from the cans, because most of the time, the cord is the point of failure. They are fairly comfortable, but I wouldn't go as far as saying that I can wear them for hours without any discomfort; although I am a larger than average person at 6'-3" and 270 lbs. The sound quality is good, but not exceptional. I would say you definitely get what you pay for here- a solidly built pair of headphones with good sound quality at a price most folks can handle. No regrets from me with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cajunron

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The ear pads keep coming off the headphone. They sound good and perform as reported, but the design of the ear pads and them coming off is really annoying; hence the one star.
customer_reviews.author: SactoBob

customer_reviews.title: Great sound makes up for small discomfort.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, has the signature Sennheiser crispness with a small emphasis on bass. Lows are tight, while mids and highs come out clear. The biggest problem is prolonged use. For me personally, after wearing for more than 20 minutes, my left ear becomes extremely sore, and I need to let it rest for a bit and readjust. Can probably be fixed with replacement ear cups. For the $80 price, they are a steal. Would recommend to most people.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Meunier

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the sound signature
customer_reviews.text: These specific closed back don't work for me. Go get the Meze 99 Noirs
customer_reviews.author: Nave

customer_reviews.title: I sent them back.
customer_reviews.text: Sent back due to lack of sound from one channel. Support indicated that this was due to my not seating plug properly, but I couldn't get it to work after multiple attempts. Too much trouble for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jim A

customer_reviews.title: Great Look, Great Sound, But.......
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these headphones. They look and sound great. However, the fit was not what I was looking for in over-ear headphones. Most over-ear headphones have an oval type shape for the cans. My Sennheiser HD280 Pros have an oval type shape and they fit my ears great. On the Urbanite XL model the cans are a perfect circle. It's not that the comfort level was that bad, it's just they were not near as good as what I was used to. Such a shame.
customer_reviews.author: V Craig Revels

customer_reviews.title: The earpads keep dropping off
customer_reviews.text: The actual sound quality was fine. The main problem are the earpads - they cannot stay in one place, and I spent more time than I ever wanted reattaching them. In the end, it was easier to throw the earphones away and buy different ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound, built
customer_reviews.text: Good sound if you like a club vibe. It’s not natural, same with beats or bose (in different manners). Personally, I prefer a result more true to the source, like Grados sr80e, wich is my actual choice and im very happy with it. Ps: The buil feels big and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel M.

customer_reviews.title: Worthy to have
customer_reviews.text: With this price, this is a wonderful headphone. I am very satisfied with it. The 3D effect works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jinan Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a set of headphones I feel comfortable that not only delivers sound but that are nice to the eyes. I have been asked a few times in the gym where I bought my headset. This is not only are a great looking but the sound is TERRIFIC.
customer_reviews.author: Gibbylove

customer_reviews.title: Beware dangly earrings but overall great product
customer_reviews.text: After a few hours it does put some pressure on the skull but overall great sound quality and just fun to play with. One of the speaker pillows did fall off though. I fixed it easily but am glad there's a warranty because it was unexpected. Also, do NOT wear expensive dangly earrings with it, I lost a ruby and pearl earring on my way out because the headphones kept rubbing against them and loosening them off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible headphones
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is very good but after a year of use the foam pads have completely fallen apart. I am not sure if they provide replacements but I do not want to spend $39 to buy new ones that will fall apart again. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great, sound DELICIOUS...
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, comfortable, and look good. All of which are secondary properties for headphones. The main criteria being how they sound, and as usual Sennheiser does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: JBell

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice, Clear Sound, Not Loud....
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable, solid, and clear....that being said, my Marshall "Major" headphones, which are available now for $40.00, are significantly louder.
customer_reviews.author: Rob F

customer_reviews.title: Great sound clarity!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones last Christmas for my son and he loves them! He highly recommends them, stating that the clarity is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: D-M-R

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: sound only works in one ear. I suspect the cable is defective.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: He said they have great sound quality for a much cheaper price than some ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these headphones for my son. He loves them. He said they have great sound quality for a much cheaper price than some competitors. He said they were comfortable also. He did wish they came with a hard case for traveling, but the bag was fine. We also had an issue where we paid for express shipping, but it took almost 5 days. The seller did refund the shipping as soon as he/she found out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the wireless version, but better audio controls in my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: You can see my other review for the wireless set of these. These are basically the same as the wireless versions, but I prefer the analog buttons to control audio on these instead of the wireless touch panel mess the others had.
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable headset I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Great! Most comfortable headset I ever had. I had one HD429 and this is much better and expensive, but it worth it. Volume buttons works for spotify@OSX but pause/play doesn't. With iOS works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: The Sound is great, they're very stylish and the ear cups are ...
customer_reviews.text: The Sound is great, they're very stylish and the ear cups are very comfortable. The cord is tangle free and the remote works well. The only downside for me is the weight; it's a little bit on the heavy side and it doesn't stay as secure as I'd like.
customer_reviews.author: mango7ang22

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, not so comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are on ear head phones and they were way too tight. The sound quality was nice but they gave me fatigue after a very short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great sound, great quality, great German engineering. This is a piece of art and don't feel flimsy like my Bose OE headphones that I've owned before. Definitely recommended
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones w/ faulty cable
customer_reviews.text: Quality sound, everything else is great except for one thing. I received a faulty inline remote cable that disrupts and disconnects the headphones when I make any movement. I own two galaxy s3's, both great condition, and the cable was faulty on each phone! Not worth to dock more than one star but still a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: These are the most comfortable over-head headphones I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable over-head headphones I've ever owned! The sound quality is phenomenal, and they look great, too.
customer_reviews.author: James Plunkett

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound amazing! They have a durable design and sleek finish. The bass isn't overwhelming but it is definitely punchy. The overall sound is clear and accurate
customer_reviews.author: D. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Good but the size is little bit tight for me
customer_reviews.text: After few hours of burning, the quality is good. While even with adjustment it seems still quite tight to me, cannot mount it for long.
customer_reviews.author: Liu Wenye

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect headphones and the microphone/remote has the entire functionality as the iPhone headphones (volume, play/pause, skip forward/back).
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: ... gift to one of our grand daughters and she love them.
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift to one of our grand daughters and she love them.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Sennheiser's exceptional quality reigns supreme.
customer_reviews.text: I love them! Best over the ear headphones I have purchased. Sennheiser never disappoints. They fit my unusually large head with ease and provide exceptional sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for small heads
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding headphones, but just could never fit right with my 7-7/8 hat size head. Very uncomfortable to my ears after 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a decent pair of headphones, the name is deceptive though. The bass in these is just non existent, which is really disappointing. If you don't really listen to rap or edm, or just songs with a lot of bass in general then these headphones are for you, otherwise you're better off buying beats.
customer_reviews.author: Ferris

customer_reviews.title: If you want a great pair of headphones these are for you.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously these are amazing. If you are used to something like beats then these will sound quiet at first but you start to adapt. Every little sound is crisp and they are great for Hip-hop /Rap.
customer_reviews.author: Rgle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: For those of you that say one ear doesn't work: Read the instructions! Overall these are a great deal, although if you want some really heavy bass, you're gonna wanna spend more $$$
customer_reviews.author: Gina Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Looks excellent
customer_reviews.text: Got it with brand new item, sounds effect is perfect, especially on high key, and the bag is helpful to protect earphone when travelling
customer_reviews.author: viewtool

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The sound of these headphones is very disappointing. The Bass is too low and the treble way to high. The Beat solo 2 is mach better.
customer_reviews.author: Lior Shachar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit, sleek design and otherworldly comfort
customer_reviews.text: Sennheiser is the only brand I'll use. The depth and clarity is gorgeous. Excellent fit, sleek design and otherworldly comfort. I forget I'm wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Murr

customer_reviews.title: No complaints what so ever.
customer_reviews.text: Sennheiser quality is Sennheiser quality. Top notch and cannot beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Good Pair of Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would have more bass punch to it (I've own a pair of Beats) but I was wrong (no it's not a bad thing) I mean there's is a slight increase in the low frequencies but overall a good pair of headphones for the price and they are comfortable for long periods, also they are bulky and seem very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jouse Valencia

customer_reviews.title: But this are way more comfortable, noise isolation is better and they are more ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm dissapointed by the sound quality, that is why I sold them and bought the Momentum 2.0 (on ear). But this are way more comfortable, noise isolation is better and they are more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a year
customer_reviews.text: So, after a year using these headphones they broke while I was wearing them. So maybe it was my fault, they do tend to be thigh around my head and maybe trying to stretch them ended up breaking them, but I shouldn't have the need to do it in the first place. //////////////////////////////////// After only 6 months I need to replace the cable. My last headphones lasted 5 years (and my brother still uses them), they cost half the price of these, and came with a second cable that I never used. Oh, and after a quick google search it seems to be a common issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice headphones and a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Randolph Perdue

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are very comfortable and the sound quality is fantastic! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Monkey

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and look really good
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable and look really good. They don't hold very well if you move your head around. I also felt they push a little too much on the sides of my head, right at the jaw joint. I can wear them for over an hour without them hurting my ears in any way, there is no burning sensation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, especially for the price. Blows beats out of the water in sound, not neccesarily the marketing
customer_reviews.author: Noah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones Overall
customer_reviews.text: Punchy bass, not overwhelming though, highs and mids very crisp, whole sound range is very clear. I have a larger sized head and they are pretty comfortable, some tension is felt after a few hours, but overall very good. Would recommend for the sale price of $120.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headphone also to my wife and now we 2 headphones in our house. Very good one
customer_reviews.author: Yacov Shaool

customer_reviews.title: Below Average
customer_reviews.text: Acceptable sound quality. Less than average comfort with ear cups. Ear cups come off too easily, resulting in a struggle to reattach them. I'd choose a competitor if I had to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Kenny

customer_reviews.title: I bought it last night and received it this morning ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it last night and received it this morning. For those who commented that their left side didn't work, I think it might be because they didn't plug the wire into the headphone correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Weiwen Wang

customer_reviews.title: Quality decision
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying my new Sennheiser Urbanite headphones. Since I'm a musician, I use them everyday. They are comfortable to wear and provide a quality sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Biggest waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced, even for $99. "Beats competitor" yeah right the bass on these things is too balanced to be claiming that. Not very comfortable and heavy, if you shake your head they will fall off. Also, they make your ears sweaty. The original cord stopped working after a month. Very minimal outside noise cancellation, if you take these on the bus you'll be cranking up the volume only to still be listening to bus noises. They're not very loud either. Do yourself a favor and just buy some earbuds
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Great balanced sound with clarity into mids
customer_reviews.text: Great balanced sound with clarity into mids. Juggling the proper level of lows is probably a tightrope walk for the engineers at Sennheiser but I personally wish there was just a touch more bass.
customer_reviews.author: Sushil Bose

customer_reviews.title: ... as they do now then I can't say enough good things about these phones
customer_reviews.text: Assuming they continue to perform as they do now then I can't say enough good things about these phones. Just a nice clear sound with plenty of range. They're very comfortable and I love the aesthetics, they are easy on the eyes. The cord the attaches to the headphones is way too short but I don't mind. worse come to worse I'd just buy an extension. Phones are totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best sounding headphones i heard with balance treble and mids and bass unlike beats
customer_reviews.author: udine

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, though expensive
customer_reviews.text: Good sound and looks great. I got these for my partner and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: Quality you can see, feel and hear!! Excellent product, excellent sound!! Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These headphones sound beautiful. They look great and more importantly
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound beautiful. They look great and more importantly, they're super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Nodeland

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality compared to other headphones in it's price ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor sound quality compared to other headphones in it's price range and cheaper. The Sennheiser Momentum on-ears sound better, which is disappointing since these came out later and were supposed to fill a similar market segment.
customer_reviews.author: AlexM23

customer_reviews.title: Cheap China Crap. Do Not Buy.
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work in the left ear. Should have paid attention to the one star reviews. They all reported this same problem. The sound quality was not that great. I give it a one star because the styling was very nice. The black denim looks legit.
customer_reviews.author: Jasco Night Light

customer_reviews.title: I really love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day and everywhere. I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Yoshioka

customer_reviews.title: Extremely short  lived
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after six weeks of very light use. Just out of the replacement window, and the left side has quit. I'm a light user, listen while I walk the dog and that's about it. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: These Headphones Worked Sometimes
customer_reviews.text: I'll be returning these. In order to get the right side to play music you need to wiggle the wire and then it works sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kimura

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN LEFT SPEAKER
customer_reviews.text: Since receiving speakers with only the right ear working I was disappointed to see others had the same problem. Lets hope the next pair has both speakers working. *Second pair worked but the seals were broken on the package and i think its been refurbished
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Left headphone not working out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Left earphone does not work. There are other reviewers that had a similar problem. I read the reviews before I purchased, and knew about the left headphone not working for others, but I had assumed that Sennheiser had corrected the issue. Sadly, they have not. Quality control for this product is inadequate. I own 3 Sennheiser HD 202 headphones that are still working after several years. I wanted to listen to a higher end headphone like the Urbanite XLs, but since they are DOA, sadly I can't. I don't have the time to test a replacement, so it's a refund for me.
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: under 100 dollars headphone, good sound, comfortable, good value
customer_reviews.text: nice product, clear sound, comfortable. wire connector at headphone a little tricky- turn until it clicks into place- if you don't only 1 side works.
customer_reviews.author: mobsterreader

customer_reviews.title: Great looking headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great looking headphones. The sound leaves something to be desired. For some reason, the clarity seems to be a little off. Also, the cable gave out after just a couple of months of light use.
customer_reviews.author: LJJ

customer_reviews.title: Overall I recommend picking these up
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a balanced headphone get this. It's materials are more premium than I thought. Decent bass. Overall I recommend picking these up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great, but terrible cable.
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic headphones. They have great sound and pretty comfortable for prolong usage. They crush my Bose SoundTrue, which I lost a couple of days ago. This is my first Sennheiser headset and was pretty nervous. They impressed big time! I wanted headphones with a mic because of how often I use my headphones but I didn't want crappy ear buds. This a great choice for people that want powerful headphones with style. One big con is their horrible cable, which lasted only about a month. The mic has background noise and the buttons act up. P.S. this is now my third cable and yes, it broke again. The quality of the cable is horrendous.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected from Sennhiser
customer_reviews.text: Overall not too bad. Not what I expected. Was really hoping for something better than studios2.0 closer to V Moda M100 maybe a Momentum with more bass, was disappointed the best description in my experience with these is that they sound as if I have cotton in my ears. I got these for $100 on Amazon and thought I'd give them a try, for $100 pretty good Would not pay full price. My option save the money and get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, only a slight problem when I wear ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, only a slight problem when I wear it for a long time. The inner wall of the headphone cuff doesn't have a trick padding so it makes it a tad bit uncomfortable but nothing too serious
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Flores

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound is unique and unmatched by any other headphone on the current market.
customer_reviews.author: john cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, but pads can slip off. Easy reattach, but a bit tedious.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Schreck

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and super comfortable on ears
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. Great sound and super comfortable on ears!
customer_reviews.author: Ladan Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Broken left ear!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this as my birthday gift for the up coming intersectional flight, but the left ear is broken. Very disappointed. Like others said this may be sent back many times but they still keep trying to see if anyone keep it.
customer_reviews.author: startraveller

customer_reviews.title: Very disappinting
customer_reviews.text: Swing and a miss for Sennheiser. Very disappointing. I've always owned Sennheiser products, from ear buds, on ear, and professional grade over-ear headphones. They always provided superior sound quality, until now. These sounded like something you'd pick up at a truck stop in an emergency. No distinct frequencies or range, regardless of equalizer mode or volume. Absolutely awful for orchestral music. The Sennheiser earbuds I use daily are far better than these cans. Also, the earcups dont really surround your ears completely. They compress the perimeter of your ears so they become uncomfortable quickly. Find something larger or stick with on-ear headphones or buds. Sennheiser makes some fantastic products. These are not among them.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I was sent a defective pair
customer_reviews.text: Not only was the right ear buzzing, but the left ear DIDN'T EVEN WORK. I feel like I was sent a defective pair. Highly recommend you do not buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ladis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent clear sound, the bass is right to enjoy my music!!!
customer_reviews.author: El CRZ

product_meta.title: Sennheiser Urbanite XL Black Urbanite XL Over-Ear Headphones - Black (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Style:Apple iOS versionStep up and step out, it's time to let your ears be loved. Sennheiser URBANITE XL Over-Ear headphones are the new choice for great sound, deep bass, and urban style on the move. URBANITE XL Over-Ear headphones deliver an intense club sound, serving up massive bass but with Sennheiser' s uncompromising clarity through the entire frequency range. URBANITE XL headphones are for those that love their tunes, love to look good, and respect great sound. URBANITE XL is perfect for staying connected on the move, with integrated in-line remote controls and microphones for taking calls and controlling music on smartphones and tablets, with two dedicated versions for either Apple iOS, or for Windows Phone and Android devices such as Samsung Galaxy models. A range of color choices includes black and denim across all models (both for iOS and Android), with the iOS URBANITE XL also available in sand, olive and nation. Ready for life on the go, URBANITE XL headphones are built tough to take on anything life can throw at them. Constructed using durable, high quality materials like stainless steel hinges and aluminum ear cup sliders, they're rugged with urban cool style. The fabric-wrapped headband is comfortable and steezy. The extra-large ear cups fitted with soft ear cushions wrap you in comfort. URBANITE XL is a Sennheiser, so looking great and performing brilliantly are one and the same. Being tough using a foldable design is a perfect fit for life on the move, and a perfect fit comes naturally to URBANITE. The durable sliders and hinges work with super soft ear pads insulating the listener from external noise to ensure great comfort during long listening sessions. So make a statement. URBANITE XL. Because you love your ears.
feature_bullets: Take the club with you - Legendary Sennheiser sound featuring massive bass, smooth midrange and extended treble..Connectivity Technology: Wired
Tough companion - Constructed using premium extra rugged parts like stainless steel hinges and aluminum sliders for reliability and durability.
Stay connected - control your music and calls (includes detachable cable with 3-button remote control and integrated microphone for Apple iOS devices)
Easy to store and bring along - foldable design makes them easy to collapse and store in the supplied soft pouch.
Peace of mind - 2-years international warranty when purchased from an Authorized Sennheiser dealer.
NOTE: Detachable cable must be inserted into headphone until it "clicks" and twisted clockwise (to the right) to lock the cable in place
